name: 5th Wheel Magic Car Parking
description:
Impossible parking! try using the 5th wheel in this magic car parking simulator, You think you are one of the best driver around and specialist car parking pro, you are as good as it gets.Do you have the skills of extreme car racing games to park your vehicle in rush hours?

Let’s see download now 5th wheel magic car parking a real multi level car parking free game simulation in stunning 3d graphics, to enjoy real Prado parking magic mania while sitting in your cozy bed or in TV lounge in relaxed environment with your kids and play best car games. This 3d multi-storey city crazy car driving simulator 2017 is different and unique from all other street car racing and park games on store because it adds up a new feature to your vehicle a 5th wheel, to enable you to park your limo or even off-road 4x4 jeep in most complex park spots in multi-storey car parking magic or in open city shopping mall traffic magic car parking simulator.

Xtreme master car driver parking simulator puts you in the boots of a street legend driver of 5th wheel magic car parking to run the street racings and parker challenge. Long journey of 50 levels to play luxury limo hard parking simulator games, in the best stunning 3d iconic cars. In new street parking driver mania 2017 drive different vehicles and super car of your choice in complex areas and park using 5th wheel to complete missions and unlock more challenging levels. As an extreme challenge driver progress in game to unlock new vehicles by earning cash and buy new one in garage junkyard. When you play Extreme free hard car parking simulator games you will forget about all other car games among all categories like stunt airplane simulator, Tokyo train games, monster truck driving and city bus driving simulator transport.

Some of the Features of 3d multi-storey city crazy driving simulator 2017 are….

Lots of Levels:
In Free highway traffic master parking 2017 there are 50 levels to play and enjoy car parking magic for a long time and have fun always.
Different Vehicles to Drive:
Earn in game cash to buy and unlock new extreme racing cars, off-road jeep, offroad SUV, 4x4 truck and lots more.
Different Environments:
Play in 2 different environment i.e. city cars park building and backyard parking in Real multi level car parking free game to enjoy open air view of airplane, city bus and monster trucks on roads.

Stunning Graphics:
While playing 5th wheel prado parking magic mania you will enjoy the best stunning 3d graphics and round about 360 degree angles camera view all in your control.

Active controls:
To keep you enjoying extreme car parking simulation the controls are tuned in best position to keep it more realistic play. Choose whatever controls that suits you, touch or steering.
